```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
db <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "imdb")
```


```{r}
#filter for remakes of movies
remakes <- db %>%
  dbGetQuery("SELECT * FROM imdb.movie_link
            JOIN title on movie_link.movie_id = title.id
            WHERE link_type_id in (3,4) 
            and kind_id = 1;")
```
